hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e set -u
# Run `highstate` separately (not as part of `orchestrate` runner) # as there is no known way to ask `orchestrate` to run it # with test=False. # See: https://github.com/saltstack/salt/issues/24209 sudo salt \ --out json \ '*' \ -l debug \ state.highstate \ test=False | tee salt.output.json
# Capture errors from Salt. # At the moment salt does not return exit/error code. # See: https://github.com/saltstack/salt/issues/18510 /srv/states/bootstrap/bootstrap.dir/modules/utils/check_salt_output.py \ salt.output.json
